name: Matrix42ExtensionsGeneratePackageTask
description: Builds a Matrix42 DWP compatible Extension. (Configuration Package)
author: Matrix42 AG

inputs.name: extensionAdditions
inputs.label: Additional Directories
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma seperated list of directories which will be added to the Extension contents.

inputs.name: extensionBuildNumber
inputs.label: Optional build number which will be appended to the Extension version.
inputs.helpMarkDown: The build number can be made out of up to 2 parts which will be added as the PATCH and REVISION part of the Extension version.

inputs.name: extensionOutput
inputs.label: Extension Output Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the location where the build Extension will be saved. (ZIP-format)

inputs.name: extensionManifestOutput
inputs.label: Extension Manifest Output Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the location where the updated Extension Manifest will be saved. (package.json)

inputs.name: developerIdentity
inputs.label: Matrix42 Developer Identity
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Developer Identity is used to sign the generated Extension to verify its authenticity and integrity.

inputs.name: developerIdentityPassword
inputs.label: Developer Identity Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password of the Developer Identity used to sign the generated Extension.
